= Alpha Build Release Notes =

Below are release notes for recent unreleased alpha builds.

== Next Alpha ==
  * Switch to standard Phone call monitoring and allow Speak to continue when app is in background, but stop Speak when a phone call occurs.
  * Improve Bible book selection:
    * List by column in Portrait to show longer lists i.e. 6x11 instead of 11x6.
    * Enable sort by name or canon
  * Toggle dc book page in Passage selector.
  * Fix position restore error when returning to large pages e.g. Clarke Gen 1.1
  * Include modules from Wycliffe repository
